data.text: @JmarrMarr @StefArmbruster @independentaus @Tofoafelix @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute Broadcast Australia used to manage transmission but it was privatised. Now owned by Canadian pension fund CAI. ABC transmission money was tied funding and not able to return to ABC coffers.

@StefArmbruster @independentaus @newsroom_the @Tofoafelix @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute I thought a Canadian company made millions because they got the gig to transmit ABC & SBS

@StefArmbruster @Tofoafelix @independentaus @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute What was the ABC’s motive for gutting its International division including Radio Australia?

@newsroom_the @Tofoafelix @independentaus @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute After the Lewis Review, did the government roll its direct funding of "transmission service" costs into the general budget of the broadcasters to encourage them to find cost "efficiencies" https://t.co/OIAV4c77ws

@Tofoafelix @StefArmbruster @independentaus @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute It was an ABC decision to save $1.5m a year in SW transmission costs.

@Tofoafelix @StefArmbruster @independentaus @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @newsroom_the @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute Duplicity from LNP? well who'd a thunk it?

@StefArmbruster @independentaus @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @newsroom_the @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute Don’t you love the political spin. Kill the ABC’s budget and then criticise the outcomes of that decision.

@StefArmbruster @Asher_Wolf @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @newsroom_the @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute Bishop's in a quantum state awaiting observation...

@StefArmbruster @abcnews @JulieBishopMP @frankelly08 @dfat @newsroom_the @PACNEWS1 @ASPI_org @radioaustralia @RNZPacific @meadea @ABCmediawatch @TheRealPBarry @anudpa @LowyInstitute Well these statements can't both be right, can they?
